Class RoomManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • use_cases.RoomManager

  • public class RoomManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages rooms.

    • Method Detail

      • addRoom

        public java.util.UUID addRoom(java.lang.String name,
                              int capacity,
                              int earliestStartTime,
                              int closingTime)
        Add a room to rooms and return the id of the new room.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the room
        capacity - integer object that represents maximum number of attendees allowed in the room.
        earliestStartTime - integer object that represents the hour in a 24 hour clock cycle, when the room will be open for events. So 7 would mean, room would open at 7:00.
        closingTime - integer object that represents the hour in a 24 hour clock cycle, when the room will be closed and no events can be scheduled from then till the end of the day. So 21 would mean, room would be closed at 21:00.
        Returns:
        an UUID object that represents the new room.

      • getRoomCapacity

        public java.lang.Integer getRoomCapacity(java.util.UUID roomId)
        Get the room capacity.
        Parameters:
        roomId - which room
        Returns:
        the capacity in integers of the room

        Get the specified room by room id.
        Parameters:
        roomId - room id
        Returns:
        the room

      • getAllRooms

        public java.util.HashMap<java.util.UUID,Room> getAllRooms()
        Get and return all existing rooms
        Returns:
        hashmap of room ids to rooms

        public java.lang.String getRoomName(java.util.UUID roomId)
        Method that gets the name of the room from room id.
        Parameters:
        roomId - UUID object that represents a room
        Returns:

      • bookRoom

        public void bookRoom(java.util.UUID roomId,
                     java.time.LocalDateTime time,
                     java.util.UUID eventId,
                     int duration)
        Book the room out at a specific time for a given duration.
        Parameters:
        roomId - the room id that was booked
        time - the time that was booked
        eventId - the event id that the room is booked for
        duration - an integer object that represents how long the room will be booked for for the event

      • checkRoomAvailability

        public boolean checkRoomAvailability(java.util.UUID roomId,
                                     java.time.LocalDateTime time,
                                     int duration)
        Check whether the room is available at a specific time for a given duration.
        Parameters:
        roomId - the room id to check
        time - the time to check
        duration - the duration from the given time, represented in hour, that to be checked if the room is available
        Returns:
        true if the room is available from the given time throughout the given duration, false otherwise.

      • getAllRoomIds

        public java.util.List<java.util.UUID> getAllRoomIds()
        Return a list of all room ids.
        Returns:
        A List of UUIDS of room ids.

        Returns:

        Remove the booking of a event at the given booking time.
        Parameters:
        time - an LocalDateTime object that represents the starting time of the booking event that would be removed.
